page.title: 05LIFE STYLES IN MALVERN WELLS
page.content: Results of a survey of life styles in 70 random households: {TRANSPORT Car ownership 0:3% l:55% 2:35% >2:7% never occasional regular Use of buses 5l% 44% 5% Use of trains 48% 45% 7% {HOUSING Detached 64% Semi-detached 24% Terraced 9% Flats 3% Owned 86% Rented l4% Average number of living rooms: 6 Average number of people per house: 3 {SHOPPING Everyday purchases are done locally. To buy items such as clothes shoes and watches the order of preference is Worcester 45%, Malvern 29%, Gloucester 13%, Cheltenham 5%, Others 8%. This is a prosperous mobile community prepared to drive 40kms or for 40mins to shop.
